title: The Rush Limbaugh Show Podcast
itunes:title: The Rush Limbaugh Show Podcast
description:
PODCAST SUMMARY HOUR 1:

Undocumented guest host Mark Steyn fills in for Rush on Lockdown Monday. Feminists don’t question Joe Biden’s sexual assault allegations. Michael Flynn could be exonerated this week. Chinese drones used to spy on American citizens. The lack of science in social distancing. Arbitrary plans by state governors. No lockdowns in Sweden. The last thing we need while dealing with COVID-19. Why don’t we know more about the virus yet? Our nanny state is the worst of all worlds.

PODCAST SUMMARY HOUR 2:

No one knows anything about COVID-19 after three months. Male coronavirus patients getting female hormone treatment. “Believe all women” doesn’t apply to Joe Biden. Good riddance: virus ends print newspapers. We need to change our lives, but the corrupt government doesn’t. We’re living the Green New Deal. Kim Jong-un’s rumored death leads to North Korean panic buying. The corona connection to Kim Jong-un’s situation. The new heir to North Korea, Kim Yo Jong. Tyson says the food supply chain is breaking. Why don’t we mass produce N95 masks?

PODCAST SUMMARY HOUR 3:

The Trumpian theme on a new normal. Joe Biden wouldn’t withstand a normal campaign season against Trump. Social justice infected the pandemic preparedness team. Michigan state senator apologizes for wearing mask that looks like the confederate flag. The American media is the worst in the English-speaking world. If China wanted a virus to take out geopolitical rivals, what would it have done differently? A shutdown will not work for six months and invites revolution. Where’s the Plan B for this? Kim Jong-un may have been injured in a missile test.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

Follow Clay & Buck on YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/c/clayandbuck

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
